original_query: When the living room lights are turned on after 8 PM, automatically dim them to 40% brightness

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, living
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: off, brighten
Could you clarify: Timing sequence is unclear - should actions happen simultaneously or sequentially?

message: I found some ambiguities in your request. I detected these locations: living_room. Please answer 3 question(s) to help me create the automation accurately.
